Deemos looked at the CR Chamber when it beeped. Inzola came out and looked =
around.

"Maximal base, it's crude but it'll do." Inzola said. Deemos laugh=
ed.

"Who are you?" Inzola asked Wrath.

Gangon's spark is still waiting.

=
Artist runs around in a circle, playing his stupid games he believed exerci=
ses him. He runs away from the Maximal base and to a mountain. He runs into=
 the mountain and an avalanche starts, Artist is burried, various thoughts =
pass through his mind. Hours later, he awakes.

"Oh, that was some blow, bu=
t I'll go with the flow." Artist said.

"Plintissa? Where are you my love? =
Come on out, Turtle Dove!" Artist called out. He remembered that she was in=
 the desert. His comm unit and compass were working, so he ran to Plintissa=
. Plintissa looked up at him coldly.

"Plintissa dear? You don't remember m=
e? For me death was near." Artist said. Plintissa looked up in shock and fl=
ew into Artist's arms. Artist laughed and they kissed. After the kiss.

"Do=
 me a favor, Artist, stop using rhymes." Plintissa said. She kissed him.

"=
Okay, I won't rhyme, we'll have a good time! Oops!" Artist said. They both =
laughed and Artist took Plintissa to a grassy plain.

Dracona held up her s=
canning device in front of Scorponok's face.

"I can find that device I los=
t." Dracona said.

"Then I'll give it to the Predacons, it's a piece of my =
blaster, it is an ice gun." Dracona said. She looked at Scorponok with big =
beautiful eyes. Sinister and Sinesis stared at her, mouths agape.

The Radi=
cons sat there still...
